original_title: Me gustaría que vivieras mi juventud de nuevo
overview: Inhabiting the intimacy of others allows one to look at oneself from a distance.  Victoria is the secretary of the film school where José studies. Although they barely know each other, they exchange their life stories to embody each other's youth. The premise of this exercise in empathy was "if I don't dare to say it, let someone else say it for me".
title: Me gustaría que vivieras mi juventud de nuevo
